div.div: East Texas Baptist vs. Sul Ross State

tr.td: ETBU wins coin toss and will receive. SRSU will defend east goal.
Zack Roberson kickoff 46 yards to the ETBU19, D. Haggerty return 18 yards to the ETBU37 (Rashawn Pickens).
K. Roberson rush for 19 yards to the SRSU44, 1ST DOWN ETBU (Melecio Haro).
J. Warbington pass complete to T. Bates for 33 yards to the SRSU11, 1ST DOWN ETBU (J. Stevens).
J. Warbington pass incomplete to T. Bates.
K. Roberson rush for 5 yards to the SRSU6 (Fernie Gonzalez;Marcus Haskin).
K. Roberson rush for 6 yards to the SRSU0, 1ST DOWN ETBU, TOUCHDOWN, clock 14:09.
East Texas Baptist 7, Sul Ross State 0
R. Travis kickoff 60 yards to the SRSU5, J. Stevens return 24 yards to the SRSU29 (D. Freeman).

Williton Grear rush for 1 yard to the SRSU30 (G. Gibson;Des. Oliver).
Colton Brownson pass incomplete to Steven Savedra.
